languages.text: "Не ворчи, старик. Лично я тихо радуюсь тому, что у покоев Лорд-капитана толстые и плотно закрывающиеся двери. Крики... не такие душераздирающие, когда их глушит толстый слой пластали".

"Don't grumble, old man. Personally, I'm just glad the Lord Captain's quarters have such heavy and tight-fitting doors. The screams... aren't as blood-curdling when they're muffled by a thick layer of plasteel."
languages.original_text: "Не ворчи, старик. Лично я тихо радуюсь тому, что у покоев Лорд-капитана толстые и плотно закрывающиеся двери. Крики... не такие душераздирающие, когда их глушит толстый слой пластали".

traits.locale_text: "Don't grumble, old man. Personally, I'm just glad the Lord Captain's quarters have such heavy and tight-fitting doors. The screams... aren't as blood-curdling when they're muffled by a thick layer of plasteel."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Don't grumble, old man. Personally, I'm just glad the Lord Captain's quarters have such heavy and tight-fitting doors. The screams... aren't as blood-curdling when they're muffled by a thick layer of plasteel."

traits.locale_text: "Don't grumble, old man. Personally, I'm just glad the Lord Captain's quarters have such heavy and tight-fitting doors. The screams... aren't as blood-curdling when they're muffled by a thick layer of plasteel."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “别抱怨了，老家伙。就我个人而言，我很庆幸舰长大人房间的大门又沉又隔音。隔着一层厚厚的塑钢，那些尖叫声听起来至少……不那么令人毛骨悚然。”
languages.original_text: "Don't grumble, old man. Personally, I'm just glad the Lord Captain's quarters have such heavy and tight-fitting doors. The screams... aren't as blood-curdling when they're muffled by a thick layer of plasteel."

traits.locale_text: “别抱怨了，老家伙。就我个人而言，我很庆幸舰长大人房间的大门又沉又隔音。隔着一层厚厚的塑钢，那些尖叫声听起来至少……不那么令人毛骨悚然。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Cessez donc de ronchonner, vieillard. Pour ma part, je suis juste contente que les quartiers {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} soient pourvus de murs aussi épais. Ces cris... sont bien moins terrifiants étouffés comme ça derrière une bonne grosse épaisseur de plastacier. »
languages.original_text: "Don't grumble, old man. Personally, I'm just glad the Lord Captain's quarters have such heavy and tight-fitting doors. The screams... aren't as blood-curdling when they're muffled by a thick layer of plasteel."

traits.locale_text: « Cessez donc de ronchonner, vieillard. Pour ma part, je suis juste contente que les quartiers {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} soient pourvus de murs aussi épais. Ces cris... sont bien moins terrifiants étouffés comme ça derrière une bonne grosse épaisseur de plastacier. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «No se queje, anciano. Yo, personalmente, me alegro de que los aposentos de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán tengan unas puertas tan pesadas y ajustadas. Los gritos... no son tan aterradores cuando los ahoga una buena capa de plastiacero».
languages.original_text: "Don't grumble, old man. Personally, I'm just glad the Lord Captain's quarters have such heavy and tight-fitting doors. The screams... aren't as blood-curdling when they're muffled by a thick layer of plasteel."

traits.locale_text: «No se queje, anciano. Yo, personalmente, me alegro de que los aposentos de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán tengan unas puertas tan pesadas y ajustadas. Los gritos... no son tan aterradores cuando los ahoga una buena capa de plastiacero».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「ぶつぶつ言わないでよ。個人的には、ロード・キャプテンの部屋が重くてぴったりしたドアでよかったと思ってるわ。悲鳴が厚いプラスチールの層で消されていれば血も凍る思いはしない」
languages.original_text: "Don't grumble, old man. Personally, I'm just glad the Lord Captain's quarters have such heavy and tight-fitting doors. The screams... aren't as blood-curdling when they're muffled by a thick layer of plasteel."

traits.locale_text: 「ぶつぶつ言わないでよ。個人的には、ロード・キャプテンの部屋が重くてぴったりしたドアでよかったと思ってるわ。悲鳴が厚いプラスチールの層で消されていれば血も凍る思いはしない」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Hört auf zu grummeln, alter Mann. Ich für meinen Teil bin einfach froh, dass das Quartier des Lord Captains solch schwere und gut schließende Türen hat. Die Schreie ... sind nicht ganz so markerschütternd, wenn sie von einer dicken Schicht Plaststahl gedämpft werden."
languages.original_text: "Don't grumble, old man. Personally, I'm just glad the Lord Captain's quarters have such heavy and tight-fitting doors. The screams... aren't as blood-curdling when they're muffled by a thick layer of plasteel."

traits.locale_text: "Hört auf zu grummeln, alter Mann. Ich für meinen Teil bin einfach froh, dass das Quartier des Lord Captains solch schwere und gut schließende Türen hat. Die Schreie ... sind nicht ganz so markerschütternd, wenn sie von einer dicken Schicht Plaststahl gedämpft werden."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "Don't grumble, old man. Personally, I'm just glad the Lord Captain's quarters have such heavy and tight-fitting doors. The screams... aren't as blood-curdling when they're muffled by a thick layer of plasteel."

languages.text: "Tat kaçırma be ihtiyar. Sen dua et, Lord Kaptan'ın kapıları hem ağır hem sıkı. Arada kalın plasçelik olunca... Çığlıkları o kadar da kan dondurucu gelmiyor."
languages.original_text: "Don't grumble, old man. Personally, I'm just glad the Lord Captain's quarters have such heavy and tight-fitting doors. The screams... aren't as blood-curdling when they're muffled by a thick layer of plasteel."

traits.locale_text: "Tat kaçırma be ihtiyar. Sen dua et, Lord Kaptan'ın kapıları hem ağır hem sıkı. Arada kalın plasçelik olunca... Çığlıkları o kadar da kan dondurucu gelmiyor."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
